original: ANDERSSON, Gösta Adolf, Direktör, Hudiksvall, f örnsk.vik 17/6 06 av rådm GAA o h h, f Pettersson, gm Clara Pettersson. Realex, hdlssk. Anst Nordemans bilaff, örn-sk.v., 24—29, kamrer AB Lönnberg & Co, Hudiksv, 29—31, eg. fma Lönnbergs Bilaff., Hudiksv, 32—33, dir f Lönnbergska Motor-comp. AB sed. 33. Ordf i Hälsingl Bilverkstad :s Fören, sekr i Nedre Norrl Automobil-handl.fören. Resor: Tyskl, Schweiz 39. Hobby: Tennis.
translated: ANDERSSON, Gösta Adolf, Director, Hudiksvall, born Örnsköldsvik on June 17, 1906, son of councilor GAA and Hilda (nee Pettersson), married Clara Pettersson. Completed lower secondary school and trade school. Employed at Nordemans car dealership in Örnsköldsvik from 1924 to 1929, then worked as an accountant at AB Lönnberg & Co in Hudiksvall from 1929 to 1931. Became a self-employed business owner of Lönnbergs Bilaffär in Hudiksvall from 1932 to 1933 and eventually became the director of Lönnbergska Motor-company AB from 1933 onwards. Served as chairman of Hälsingland Car Workshop Association, and secretary of the Lower Norrland Automobile Dealers Association. Traveled to Germany and Switzerland in 1939. Hobbies include tennis.

structured.name: Gösta Adolf Andersson
